sql:
SELECT a.name, COALESCE(cit.citation_count, 0) AS citation_count
FROM Author a
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT al.author_id, COUNT(*) AS citation_count
    FROM Author_list al
    JOIN Citation ci ON al.paper_id = ci.cited_paper_id
    GROUP BY al.author_id
) cit ON a.author_id = cit.author_id
ORDER BY citation_count DESC
LIMIT 1;
question: Find the name and number of citations of the author who has most citations among all authors?

sql:
SELECT a.name, COUNT(c.paper_id) AS num_citations
FROM Author a
JOIN Author_list al ON a.author_id = al.author_id
JOIN Citation c ON al.paper_id = c.cited_paper_id
GROUP BY a.author_id, a.name
ORDER BY num_citations DESC
LIMIT 1;
question: Find the name and number of citations of the author who has most citations among all authors?

sql:
SELECT a.name, COUNT(*) AS num_citations
FROM Citation c
JOIN Author_list al ON c.cited_paper_id = al.paper_id
JOIN Author a ON al.author_id = a.author_id
GROUP BY a.author_id, a.name
ORDER BY num_citations DESC
LIMIT 1;
question: Find the name and number of citations of the author who has most citations among all authors?

sql:
SELECT a.name, COUNT(c.paper_id) AS citation_count
FROM Author a
JOIN Author_list al ON a.author_id = al.author_id
JOIN Citation c ON al.paper_id = c.cited_paper_id
GROUP BY a.author_id, a.name
ORDER BY citation_count DESC
LIMIT 1;
